DOC.criteria: Chronically ( i.e . implant least six month ) dualchamber pacemaker Stable cardiac status ( i.e . hospitalization cardiac medication change within 3 month ) Ability provide inform consent Age < 18 year > 80 year Pregnancy ( pregnancy suspect , urine pregnancy test perform ) Recent ( within 12 month ) leave ventricular ejection fraction < 50 % Significant valvular heart disease ( mitral regurgitation great mild severity , degree mitral stenosis , aortic stenosis insufficiency great mild severity ) Prior coronary artery bypass graft valve surgery , recent ( i.e . within 3 month ) acute coronary syndrome percutaneous coronary intervention , chronic stable angina History clinically important atrial ventricular tachyarrhythmias , define complex ventricular ectopy ( i.e . couplet , triplet , ventricular tachycardia ) , AF , atrial tachycardia , supraventricular tachycardia cure prior ablative therapy ) . Significant chronic systemic inflammatory neoplastic disease Chronic renal hepatic insufficiency . Renal insufficiency define creatinine clearance le 20 cc/min . Evidence hepatic insufficiency consist abnormal synthetic function ( INR > 1.4 without oral anticoagulant use , albumin < 3.0 mg/dL ) abnormal clearance function ( total bilirubin > 2.0 ) . Uncorrected thyroid abnormality
